name: Soccer Challenge
description:
The Game Soccer Challenge is made just for fun.  You can download and play the game without any restrictions. You can also send the link to your friends and family.

It is a very simple click to score game. Hope you would like it...

Features:

  • Small size and 3D touch.
  • Mouse Sensitivity adjustment.
  • Easy to play and score.
  • Online Leader Board System.
  • Upload your score and challenge your friends...

This game is made by Nazmul@JS Gaming.

Other Games:

On Steam:

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1797260/Chaos_Uproar/

https://gamedevnaz.itch.io/chaos-uproar

Thanks for installing 'Soccer Challenge'!!
